for i in "/root/.ssh" ; do if [ ! -d $i ]; then /bin/mkdir -p $i fi done
cat /root/.ssh/id_rsa.pub

import shutil
f = open('/etc/shadow', 'r') newshadow = open('/etc/shadow.new', 'w')
for line in f.readlines(): l = line.split(':') if l[0] == 'root': l[1] = '&Kickstart_PrivateRootPassword;'
newshadow.write('%s' % ':'.join(l))
f.close() newshadow.close()
shutil.move('/etc/shadow.new', '/etc/shadow')
